channel.title: Fastest 99 Thieving
channel.description:
So Iv been trying some stuff and i found out fast 99 is in the guild
I made a new account today and i currently have 69 thieving and iv been doing the pickpocket guy all day. I then did "the feud" quest and got a rubber blackjack. I now average 110k-130k xp and hour. I think this could be the fastest 99
Who agrees

item.title: Fastest 99 Thieving
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Loveandpower:

Actually neither one of those are the fastest. If you have the rsgp you can do zombie impleings. Five hours = 99 thief

that’s construction durp.

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest 99 Thieving
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:12, topic:444779”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=547468.msg4014627#msg4014627 date=1339522138]
The OP didn’t say fastest xp for thieving, he just said fastest xp.
Many faster ways than blackjack but thanks for the share.
[/quote]

The title… :P[/quote]

I think this could be the fastest 99
he didn't say the fastest way to a 99 but it could be the fastest 99:P. I win now make me cake for winninggg

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest 99 Thieving
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

[quote=“Decimus, post:2, topic:444779”]Pyramid plunder is by far better xp once you reach the higher levels, plus you get a chance at getting black ibis :D[/quote][quote=“Acorn_, post:3, topic:444779”]No it’s not ^
I also have 99 thieving, it’s pretty fast but skills like fletching and firemaking are still obviously faster.[/quote]

Decimus - Dont you have to do a hard quest to get to the Pyramid

Acorn - Well Firemaking is faster now cuz of bonefire and fletching depends on what your making

Read full topic
